text:
I don’t wear bodysuits because I can’t deal with anything between my thighs pushing against my labia.

However, my husband bought me this totally see through lace top. He bought it on the understanding that I would wear a black lacy bra under it.

I don’t usually wear a bra, so that was sort-of an olive branch to my worries of over exposing myself.

But - when the see-through blouse arrived - although it was lovely, black and silky I couldn’t bear to wear it, even over a bra!

Now I am a woman that doesn’t even own any knickers and only wears a bra to the office. The sight of me in a see-through blouse with a bra under it wouldn’t shock anyone - except I still can’t do it!
title: I have a completely see-through lace bodysuit. How do I wear it in public?
